QuestData.Title: Sprite Fright
QuestData.Description: Oh bother, how am I supposed to get my tasks done, now?$B$BInstructor Skythorn asked me to go kill some tigers at Windward Isle, but I heard the area was overrun with sprites!$B$BUgh! I hate sprites! They totally give me the creeps!$B$BThey're so small, and... and... they jump on you and... and... they have cold, dead little stick hands!$B$BAuuugh! You have to help me, $n. Get rid of those things, please!
